rows.label: qst502013_msg0001
rows.name:
Young maiden of lightning!
Prithee tarry awhile.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0003
rows.name:
Thou wieldest great strength in the
ways of lightning, dost thou not?

rows.label: qst502013_msg0004
rows.name:
Well, um...I do use lightning, but...
I'm a bit crap at controlling it.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0005
rows.name:
No matter, no matter. Might I beg
of thee to demonstrate thy skill?

rows.label: qst502013_msg0006
rows.name:
I too am a disciple of the ways of
lightning, yet the limits of my skill
weigh down upon my soul.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0007
rows.name:
Witnessing the arts of a fellow disciple
may provide me the inspiration I seek.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0008
rows.name:
Oh, all right then.
Watch this!

rows.label: qst502013_msg0009
rows.name:
Thy strength is truly remarkable.
Words fail me!

rows.label: qst502013_msg0010
rows.name:
With such strength, thou shalt surely
be able to protect those dear to thee.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0012
rows.name:
Yea, verily. Would only that I were
possessed of such strength as thee.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0013
rows.name: I must hone my skills yet further.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0014
rows.name:
Thou hast my gratitude, fair maiden.
And now, I must away.

rows.label: qst502013_msg0015
rows.name:
Ohhh, I really don't think I have enough
skills to demonstrate... I'm so sorry!
